title: Strategies for Promoting Educational Equity Using Digital Education Platforms

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy (experience using online learning platforms) and understanding of elementary education fundamentals
context.additional_context: Modular design required for corporate learner programs to flexibly accommodate work schedules, fostering a collaborative learning environment through knowledge sharing among participants.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the principles of student-centered digital platform design and utilize tools to diagnose educational equity issues
Learners can establish personalized learning strategies by applying data visualization techniques for analyzing learner engagement
Learners can propose improvements to platform accessibility and content fairness based on formative assessment results

resources: LMS (e.g., Moodle), data analysis tools (e.g., Google Analytics), digital accessibility evaluation checklist

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
